resources.string: Lakshay Kamat, a passionate Android developer adept in Java/Kotlin, UI/UX design, and backend integration. Dedicated to crafting intuitive, efficient apps with attention to detail and a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.

Effortlessly calculate tips with our user-friendly app. Tailored for seamless usability, it simplifies tip calculations, ensuring a hassle-free dining experience. Make tipping a breeze with our intuitive Tip Calculator app.
